property.name: phone_flow
property.value: insert into mobile_phone_flow values(?,?,?,?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE phoneupflow = ?,phonedownflow = ?,phonetotalflow = ?

property.name: site_visit
property.value: insert into website_phone_count values(?,?,?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE phonecount = ?

property.name: pv_count
property.value: insert into website_phone_pv values(?,?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE phonepv = ?

property.name: mobile_2
property.value: insert into mobile_phone_flow values(?,?,?,?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE phoneupflow = ?,phonedownflow=?,phonetotalflow=?

property.name: mobile_1
property.value: insert into mobile_phone_count values(?,?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE phonecount=?
